title: How much relative grading was there in maths? Can someone please comment their overall marks and grade in maths, as I have to apply for re-evaluation

comments.body: In 1st year u will get a better grade then u expected in maths dw

Yeah, already got the grade lol
But it might increase after re-evaluation, that's why I'm asking for marks vs grade as I'm not sure how much relative grading was there

I have 77/100 and got an A grade
So from this we can predict that bounds were changed Atleast by 3 marks
I got 49 total isa and my grade at the end was S
Nobody knows how much relative was there , only other people who saw their paper can tell
Bro can they decrease the grade if they cut marks in re-evaluation?

No

Marks can change but grade will either remain same or increase, it cannot go down.
Which other papers did u see?

Like if they cut some marks and according to the revised marks, the grade goes down

In that case, do they give the best out of 2 grades?

I saw mechanical, maths and physics
I don’t think there’s any reason to downvote my comment guys?
Can u say the marks and grade u got for all these?
guys is there any chance, 2 ppl can get same total score but 2 different grades cuz i saw my paper and my total score sums up to 77 but but i got a B grade...??
